title: Added Path Effects
body: This is the code for issue #47

comments.author: bholmes
comments.body:
@mattleibow,

I am not seeing ref and unref calls on the new SKEffect object.  What is keeping the object alive or causing it to be cleaned up?

comments.author: migueldeicaza
comments.body: @bholmes it inherits the Finalizer/Disposer from SKObject which has the unref, and the object creation creates the objects with refcount=1

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
@migueldeicaza In this case, @bholmes is right because `SKObject` does not have the unref. This is because not all `SKObject`s are `SKRefCnt` objects. An example would be `SKBitmap`/`SKPaint`, which is just a plain object and the destructor is used.

I think there are just those two variants, so I could create another type that uses the unref and the base uses the destructor, but for simplicity's sake, I just unref in the dispose methods. So, in this case, I forgot to add the unref, which I have added now.

comments.author: bholmes
comments.body: @mattleibow we can merge this when you are ready.  I know you are working on a new version + upstreaming changes.  So I will let you decide when is the best time to merge.
